name: Aave Token
description: Aave is a decentralized money market where users can lend and borrow more than 25 different crypto assets. Lenders can earn interest by providing liquidity to the market, while borrowers can borrow by collateralizing their cryptoassets to take out loans from the liquidity pools. AAVE tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees in exchange for providing an insurance backstop.

en.description: Aave is a decentralized money market where users can lend and borrow more than 25 different crypto assets. AAVE tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees in exchange for providing an insurance backstop.

fr.description: Aave is a decentralized money market where users can lend and borrow more than 25 different crypto assets. AAVE tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees in exchange for providing an insurance backstop.

es.description: Aave es un mercado de dinero descentralizado donde los usuarios pueden prestar y pedir prestado más de 25 criptoactivos diferentes. Los prestamistas pueden ganar intereses proporcionando liquidez al mercado, mientras que los prestatarios pueden pedir prestado garantizando sus criptoactivos para obtener préstamos de los fondos de liquidez. Los tokens AAVE se utilizan para la gobernanza del protocolo y se puede hacer staking por tarifas de protocolo a cambio de proporcionar un respaldo de seguro.

de.description: Aave is a decentralized money market where users can lend and borrow more than 25 different crypto assets. AAVE tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees in exchange for providing an insurance backstop.

tr.description: Aave, kullanıcıların 25'ten fazla farklı kripto varlığı ödünç verip ödünç alabilecekleri merkezi olmayan bir para piyasasıdır. Borç verenler piyasaya likidite sağlayarak faiz kazanabilirken, borç alanlar likidite havuzlarından kredi almak için kripto varlıklarını teminat altına alarak borç alabilirler. AAVE belirteçleri protokol yönetimi için kullanılır ve bir sigorta geri dönüşü sağlama karşılığında protokol ücretleri için stake edilebilir.

vi.description: Aave is a decentralized money market where users can lend and borrow more than 25 different crypto assets. Lenders can earn interest by providing liquidity to the market, while borrowers can borrow by collateralizing their cryptoassets to take out loans from the liquidity pools. AAVE tokens are used for protocol governance and can be staked for protocol fees in exchange for providing an insurance backstop.

zh.description: Aave 是个去中心化的货币市场，为用户提供超过 25 种加密资产的借贷服务。存款用户可以提供流动性赚取利息，借款用户可以抵押资产以从流动性池借出其它资产。AAVE 是协议的治理代币，用户质押 AAVE 可以为协议提供保险的同时也分享协议收入。

hi.description: Aave एक विकेन्द्रीकृत मुद्रा बाजार है जहां उपयोगकर्ता 25 से अधिक विभिन्न क्रिप्टो संपत्ति उधार दे सकते हैं और उधार ले सकते हैं। ऋणदाता बाजार को तरलता प्रदान करके ब्याज अर्जित कर सकते हैं, जबकि उधारकर्ता तरलता पूल से ऋण लेने के लिए अपनी क्रिप्टोकरंसी को संपार्श्विक बनाकर उधार ले सकते हैं। AAVE टोकन का उपयोग प्रोटोकॉल शासन के लिए किया जाता है और बीमा बैकस्टॉप प्रदान करने के बदले प्रोटोकॉल शुल्क के लिए दांव लगाया जा सकता है।
